column2: Union accepts proposed labor deal at Alcoa Intalco aluminum smelterUPDATE 1-Union accepts proposed labor deal at Alcoa Intalco aluminum smelter Oct 16 Workers at Alcoa's Intalco Works aluminum smelter voted to accept the company's final contract offer

column2: UPDATE 2-Google book-scanning project legal
column3: says U.S. appeals court NEW YORK
column4: Oct 16 A U.S. appeals court ruled on Friday that Google's massive effort to scan millions of books for an online library does not violate copyright law
column5: rejecting claims from a group of authors that the project illegally deprives them of revenue.

column2: U.S. oncology group rates blood cancer regimens
column3: including cost Oct 16 The most influential source for U.S. oncology treatment guidelines on Friday unveiled ratings aimed at helping doctors and patients assess the costs versus benefits of current therapies for two types of blood cancer.

column3: Uber to test college football streaming in connected cars NEW YORK
column4: Oct 16 AT&T; Inc said on Friday it has partnered with Uber to roll out connected car rides in four cities for a limited time to let passengers watch college football games live from tablets in the backseat during their trips.

column5: a sign low prices continued to keep drillers away from the well pad.

column3: Uber to test college football streaming in connected cars NEW YORK
column4: Oct 16 AT&T; Inc said on Friday it has partnered with Uber to roll out connected car rides in four cities for a limited time to let passengers watch college football games live from tablets in the backseat during their trips.
